properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Southern USVI, Vieques, and Eastern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 6:43AM AST until January 26 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A NORTHERLY SWELL WILL IMPACT THE REGION BEGINNING TODAY...

.A swell associated with low pressure to our north will affect
local waters this morning and into Sunday. Seas are expected to
build between 6-8 feet across the Atlantic waters and passages.

* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet expected, with occasional seas to 9
feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Southern USVI Vieques and Eastern
Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 AM AST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM AST SUNDAY
